subject: New file uploaded to EVP-ITC
author: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
full_text:
Hello,

This email message is a notification to let you know that
a file has been uploaded to the Files area of the EVP-ITC 
group.

  File        : /Kristin's Files/My Perm Techs BOB & PETE.wav 
  Uploaded by : nitsirk65 <ckmorris95@...> 
  Description : Asked for my permanent techs.  I heard quite a few faint BOBs but I wasn't sure until I heard one clearly.  Then I asked if it was just Bob or Bob & Pete.  They replied BOB AND PETE. 

You can access this file at the URL:
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/EVP-ITC/files/Kristin%27s%20Files/My%20Perm%20Techs%20BOB%20%26%20PETE.wav 

To learn more about file sharing for your group, please visit:
http://help.yahoo.com/l/us/yahoo/groups/original/members/web/index.htmlfiles

Regards,

nitsirk65 <ckmorris95@...>
